comments.body: Can you collapse each of these into one overload with optional arguments?

@DanielRosenwasser Unless i'm misunderstanding that alters the return type into a manner that i find un-intuitive.
`totalTime(time?: number, suppressEvents?: boolean): Animation | boolean;` 

Just looks confusing. Is this what you meant?

With the types as they are, its clear that if you pass no arguments you're guaranteed to get a boolean. With the adjustment it reads as you might get one, you might get the other.
@DanielRosenwasser this looks fine to me as is. Will merge unless you object.
